data.text: @FFPeasants Hope u r well and miss your videos, Pez. Well Sony state of play is happening tomorrow. So some of your questions may be answered tomorrow.
@FFPeasants What if the empire already seized the dark crystal that was probably in that rock? 👀 Ugh it's always something bad when rocks break 😭
@FFPeasants There's a fine line between genius and madness (about Final Fantasy) and this is why you're my favorite example of that 🤣💜
@FFPeasants I miss you Peas! Which FF girl are you gonna repopulate the earth with when Russia uses Zetta flare? (Tifa is a given) 🤔🤔 I call dibs on Yshtola!
@FFPeasants The Demon just wanted to return home https://t.co/pydekBxl0T
@FFPeasants Good to hear you're doing ok but I think I'd want Terra at my back for this
@FFPeasants That Boulder about to unleashâ€¦ https://t.co/EGs5rYixxt

@FFPeasants Terra would be the best choice! Did you see how Putin reacts to topless women yesterday? In a final battle against him, he would be completely enamored while you go in for the final strike xD https://t.co/sj8cmDidPu
@FFPeasants Never has there been a better time to turn into crystal L'cie style😅
